bibl.title: Sitometria in the Zenon Archive: Identifying Zenon's Personal Documents.
bibl.note: "I intend to show that Orrieux has overlooked several crucial facts which relate to the accounts of sitometria, and that these facts suggest that many of his bold conclusions rest on untenable assumptions". - Appendix (pp. 75-98): Prosopography of the individuals who appear in the sitometric documents.
bibl.seg: Franko George Fredric, Sitometria in the Zenon Archive: Identifying Zenon's Personal Documents.
